com.bignerdranch.expandablerecyclerview.Adapter

Interface ExpandableRecyclerAdapter.ExpandCollapseListener

  • Enclosing class:
    ExpandableRecyclerAdapter<PVH extends ParentViewHolder,CVH extends ChildViewHolder>

    public static interface ExpandableRecyclerAdapter.ExpandCollapseListener
    Allows objects to register themselves as expand/collapse listeners to be notified of change events.

    Implement this in your Activity or Fragment to receive these callbacks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onListItemCollapsed(int position)
      Called when a list item is collapsed.
      void onListItemExpanded(int position)
      Called when a list item is expanded.

    • Method Detail

      • onListItemExpanded

        void onListItemExpanded(int position)
        Called when a list item is expanded.
        Parameters:
        position - The index of the item in the list being expanded

      • onListItemCollapsed

        void onListItemCollapsed(int position)
        Called when a list item is collapsed.
        Parameters:
        position - The index of the item in the list being collapsed
